text: Pergamino Partido is a partido in the north of Buenos Aires Province in Argentina. The provincial subdivision has a population of about 100,000 inhabitants in an area of , and its capital city is Pergamino, which is around from Buenos Aires. ==Settlements== Pergamino has 23 (districts): # Pergamino: capital # Francisco Ayerza # Ortíz Basualdo # Rancagua # Urquiza # Maguire # Villa Dafonte # Fontezuela # Manantiales Grande # Manantiales Chico # La Violeta # Pujol # Guerrico # Manuel Ocampo # Colonia Buena Vista # J.A. de la Peña # Acevedo # Mariano Benítez # El Socorro # Arroyo del Medio # Colonia Santa Rosa] # Mariano H.
